Song.title: My Redeemer's Love
Song.copyright: © 2012 Sovereign Grace Praise/Sovereign Grace Worship Words & Music by Mark Altrogge, Jordan Kauflin, Joel Sczebel

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [Eb | Gm | Bb/F | Dm | Eb | Gm | Bb/F | Dm]
V. 1: My [Cm]Redeemer’s love is [Bb]deeper[F]{,} [ ]than the depths of sin and [Gm]hell He who was enthroned in [Eb]glory[Gm]{,} [ ]came to bring us to Hims[F]elf My Redeemer’s love is [Eb]wider[Gm]{,} [ ]than the breach my sins had [Cm]made [Eb] [ ]He reached down into my [Gm]darkness[F]{,} [ ]He alone has pow’r[Bb] to save
CH. 1: [Eb]Deeper than the rolling s[Bb]eas, [Gm]higher than the mountain p[F]eaks Your l[Eb]ove is [Gm]all I n[F]eed
V. 2: My Redeemer’s love is [Bb]stronger[F]{,} [ ]than my fiercest ene[Gm]mies He will hold me in the [Eb]tempest[Gm], [ ]through the flood He carries [F]me My Redeemer’s love will [Eb]lead me[Gm]{,} [ ]through the deepest valley [Cm]here [Eb] [ ]He will shepherd me and [Gm]guide me[F], [ ]He will ever kee[Bb]p me near
CH. 2: [Eb]Deeper than the rolling s[Bb]eas, [Gm]higher than the mountain p[F]eaks Your l[Eb]ove is [Gm]all I n[F]eed [Eb]Stronger than the rushing w[Bb]ind, [Gm]shattering the power of s[F]in Your l[Eb]ove is [Gm]all I n[F]eed
V. 3: My Redeemer’s love grows [Bb]sweeter[F]{,} [ ]as eternity draws [Gm]near I’ll enjoy His love for[Eb]ever[Gm]{,} [ ]at His throne for endless [F]years My Redeemer’s love will [Eb]fill me[Gm]{,} [ ]on the day I see His [Cm]face [Eb] [ ]I will love Him back for[Gm]ever[F]{,} [ ]and forever sin[Bb]g His praise
Arrangement.searchtext: intro v 1 my redeemers love is deeper than the depths of sin and hell he who was enthroned in glory came to bring us to himself my redeemers love is wider than the breach my sins had made he reached down into my darkness he alone has powr to save ch 1 deeper than the rolling seas higher than the mountain peaks your love is all i need v 2 my redeemers love is stronger than my fiercest enemies he will hold me in the tempest through the flood he carries me my redeemers love will lead me through the deepest valley here he will shepherd me and guide me he will ever keep me near ch 2 deeper than the rolling seas higher than the mountain peaks your love is all i need stronger than the rushing wind shattering the power of sin your love is all i need v 3 my redeemers love grows sweeter as eternity draws near ill enjoy his love forever at his throne for endless years my redeemers love will fill me on the day i see his face i will love him back forever and forever sing his praise
